(d)  Based on the rates quoted by LCBs   
(e)  Maximum rate is a special rate offered by certain LCBs. 
(f)   Since July 2018, AWDR and AWFDR were calculated by replacing senior citizens’ special 
deposit rate of 15 per cent with relevant market interest rates to exclude the impact of special 
rates. Same method was applied to calculate AWNDR and AWNFDR since June 2018.
(g)  Based on the rates quoted by other selected Financial Institutions
(h)  Interest rate ranges are based on the average maximum and average minimum rates quoted 
by LFCs which are applicable for deposits mobilised and loans granted during the respective 
months. Data for 2021 are provisional. 
(i)   Lending for housing purposes only
